## UseOverflowStateArgs.scrollableElementRef property

Ref for the scrollable element (must have `overflow-x: auto` or `overflow-x: visible`<!-- -->).

**Signature:**

```typescript
scrollableElementRef: RefObject<HTMLElement>;
```
